senses.sense_definition: A surname transferred from a nickname.

examples.text: Ada <w>Lovelace</w> is widely recognized as the first computer programmer.
Mr. <w>Lovelace</w> signed the contract on behalf of the company.

senses.sense_definition: A well-mannered man who acts without moral restraint, especially in sexual matters; a charming seducer.

examples.text: He fancied himself a <w>Lovelace</w>, using his charm to win over every woman at the party.
The novel depicts a dangerous <w>Lovelace</w> who destroys the reputation of the protagonist.
